title: Style Abbreviations
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Style Abbreviations**

**Styles**  
MC - [Mid-Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mid-Capitals) (mid-caps)  
SC - [Small Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Small%20Capitals) (small caps)  
Exp - [Expert Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Expert%20Font)

**[Figures](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Figures)**  
OS or OSF - [Old Style Figures](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Style%20Figures)  
LF - [Lining Figures](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lining%20Figures)  
TF - [Tabular Figures](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415060942/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tabular%20Figures)
author: Stephen Coles
